remarks: Existence of an operator abstraction.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
statement:
oprabexd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
oprabexd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) $.
oprabexd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> E* z ps ) $.
oprabexd.4 $e |- ( ph -> F = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ps ) } ) $.
oprabexd $p |- ( ph -> F e. _V ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
